verses.verse: Send <WH7971> ye the lamb <WH3733> to the ruler <WH4910> of the land <WH776> from Sela <WH4480> <WH5554> to the wilderness, <WH4057> unto <WH413> the mount <WH2022> of the daughter <WH1323> of Zion. <WH6726>

For it shall be, <WH1961> that, as a wandering <WH5074> bird <WH5775> cast out <WH7971> of the nest, <WH7064> so the daughters <WH1323> of Moab <WH4124> shall be <WH1961> at the fords <WH4569> of Arnon. <WH769>

Take <WH935> counsel, <WH6098> execute <WH6213> judgment; <WH6415> make <WH7896> thy shadow <WH6738> as the night <WH3915> in the midst <WH8432> of the noonday; <WH6672> hide <WH5641> the outcasts; <WH5080> betray <WH1540> not <WH408> him that wandereth. <WH5074>

Let mine outcasts <WH5080> dwell <WH1481> with thee, Moab; <WH4124> be <WH1933> thou a covert <WH5643> to them from the face <WH4480> <WH6440> of the spoiler: <WH7703> for <WH3588> the extortioner <WH4160> is at an end, <WH656> the spoiler <WH7701> ceaseth, <WH3615> the oppressors <WH7429> are consumed <WH8552> out of <WH4480> the land. <WH776>

And in mercy <WH2617> shall the throne <WH3678> be established: <WH3559> and he shall sit <WH3427> upon <WH5921> it in truth <WH571> in the tabernacle <WH168> of David, <WH1732> judging, <WH8199> and seeking <WH1875> judgment, <WH4941> and hasting <WH4106> righteousness. <WH6664>

We have heard <WH8085> of the pride <WH1347> of Moab; <WH4124> he is very <WH3966> proud: <WH1341> even of his haughtiness, <WH1346> and his pride, <WH1347> and his wrath: <WH5678> but his lies <WH907> shall not <WH3808> be so. <WH3651>

Therefore <WH3651> shall Moab <WH4124> howl <WH3213> for Moab, <WH4124> every one <WH3605> shall howl: <WH3213> for the foundations <WH808> of Kir-hareseth <WH7025> shall ye mourn; <WH1897> surely <WH389> they are stricken. <WH5218>

For <WH3588> the fields <WH7709> of Heshbon <WH2809> languish, <WH535> and the vine <WH1612> of Sibmah: <WH7643> the lords <WH1167> of the heathen <WH1471> have broken down <WH1986> the principal plants <WH8291> thereof, they are come <WH5060> even unto <WH5704> Jazer, <WH3270> they wandered <WH8582> through the wilderness: <WH4057> her branches <WH7976> are stretched out, <WH5203> they are gone over <WH5674> the sea. <WH3220>

Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> I will bewail <WH1058> with the weeping <WH1065> of Jazer <WH3270> the vine <WH1612> of Sibmah: <WH7643> I will water <WH7301> thee with my tears, <WH1832> O Heshbon, <WH2809> and Elealeh: <WH500> for <WH3588> the shouting <WH1959> for <WH5921> thy summer fruits <WH7019> and for <WH5921> thy harvest <WH7105> is fallen. <WH5307>

And gladness <WH8057> is taken away, <WH622> and joy <WH1524> out of <WH4480> the plentiful field; <WH3759> and in the vineyards <WH3754> there shall be no <WH3808> singing, <WH7442> neither <WH3808> shall there be shouting: <WH7321> the treaders <WH1869> shall tread <WH1869> out no <WH3808> wine <WH3196> in their presses; <WH3342> I have made their vintage shouting <WH1959> to cease. <WH7673>
Wherefore <WH921> <WH3651> my bowels <WH4578> shall sound <WH1993> like a harp <WH3658> for Moab, <WH4124> and mine inward parts <WH7130> for Kir-haresh. <WH7025>

And it shall come to pass, <WH1961> when <WH3588> it is seen <WH7200> that <WH3588> Moab <WH4124> is weary <WH3811> on <WH5921> the high place, <WH1116> that he shall come <WH935> to <WH413> his sanctuary <WH4720> to pray; <WH6419> but he shall not <WH3808> prevail. <WH3201>
This <WH2088> is the word <WH1697> that <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> hath spoken <WH1696> concerning <WH413> Moab <WH4124> since that time. <WH4480> <WH227>

But now <WH6258> the LORD <WH3068> hath spoken, <WH1696> saying, <WH559> Within three <WH7969> years, <WH8141> as the years <WH8141> of a hireling, <WH7916> and the glory <WH3519> of Moab <WH4124> shall be contemned, <WH7034> with all <WH3605> that great <WH7227> multitude; <WH1995> and the remnant <WH7605> shall be very small <WH4592> <WH4213> and feeble. <WH3808> <WH3524>
